articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Liverpool vs AFC Bournemouth in the Premier League
articles.title: Liverpool vs Bournemouth LIVE: Premier League score, lineups & updates

articles.description: All-rounder Jacob Bethell, 21, is set to become the youngest man to captain England in an international when he leads an understrength T20 side on a tour of Ireland.
articles.title: Jacob Bethell: England name all-rounder as youngest captain for Ireland tour

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on singer Tom Grennan with his predictions for the opening round of Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League opening weekend predictions: Chris Sutton v singer Tom Grennan

articles.description: Liverpool sign centre-back Giovanni Leoni from Italian side Parma for £26m on a deal until 2031.
articles.title: Giovanni Leoni: Liverpool sign 18-year-old defender from Parma for £26m

articles.description: Wayne Rooney was involved in transfer sagas in his playing career and says in his new podcast it will be hard for Alexander Isak to stay at Newcastle.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Wayne Rooney says it is difficult for striker to stay at Newcastle

articles.description: Northern Superchargers face Birmingham Phoenix in the men's Hundred - follow live scores, radio commentary and updates.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025 LIVE: Northern Superchargers vs Birmingham Phoenix - cricket score, radio & updates

articles.description: Bournemouth open talks to sign Scotland winger Ben Doak from Liverpool, who want £25m for the 19-year-old.
articles.title: Ben Doak: Bournemouth in talks to sign Liverpool winger

articles.description: Salford's Super League game against Wakefield on Sunday is called off because of welfare concerns after discussions with the Rugby Football League.
articles.title: Salford Red Devils: Wakefield match cancelled over welfare concerns

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Moses Itauma's rise through the heavyweight ranks and the hype surrounding him as he prepares to face Dillian Whyte in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Moses Itauma vs Dillian Whyte: Time to believe the hype? Young Briton hits big stage with Saudi Arabia fight

articles.description: Phoebe Litchfield hammers an unbeaten 59 off 28 balls as Northern Superchargers cruise to a clinical eight-wicket win over Birmingham Phoenix in The Hundred with 26 balls to spare.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025 results: Phoebe Litchfield leads Superchargers to comfortable win over Phoenix
